Author: Crotchetylilkitten
Text: You will poop all the water out of your body. But it won't suppress appetite. Though it may cause some pretty rough stomach upset. Be careful and make sure you drink water and replace your electrolytes.

Author: alwaysrelapsing17
Text: It's not an appetite suppressant if I remember correctly (haven't used it/thought of it since I was like 13) it just makes you shit your guts out like a laxative.
